select * from department d
d.is_del=0
and d.dname=#{dname}
order by d.did desc
mapper.update: update department set dname=#{dname} where did=#{did}
update department set is_del=1 where did=#{did}
update major set mname=#{mname},did=#{did} where mid=#{mid}
update major set is_del=1 where mid={mid}
mapper.select: select * from department d,major m where m.did=d.did and d.did=#{did}
mapper.update: update grade set gname=#{gname},mid=#{mid} where gid=#{gid}
update grade set is_del=1 where gid=#{gid}
mapper.select: select * from grade where mid=#{mid} and is_del=0
mapper.update: update classinfo set classname=#{classname},gid=#{gid} where classid=#{classid}
update classinfo set is_del=1 where classid=#{classid}
mapper.select: select c.classid,c.classname from classinfo c inner join grade g on c.gid=g.gid inner join major m on g.mid=m.mid inner join department d on m.did=d.did where c.is_del=0 and g.is_del=0 and m.is_del=0 and d.is_del=0 group by c.classname order by c.classid

select g.gid,g.gname from grade g inner join major m on g.mid=m.mid inner join department d on m.did=d.did where g.is_del=0 and d.is_del=0
and m.mid in(select m.mid from major m where m.mname=#{mname} and m.is_del=0)
group by g.gname order by g.gid

select m.mid,m.mname from major m inner join department d on m.did = d.did where m.is_del=0
and d.did in(select d.did from department d where d.dname=#{dname} and d.is_del=0)
group by m.mname order by m.mid
select did,dname from department where is_del=0 group by dname order by did
select count(*) from department where dname=#{dname} and is_del=0
select count(*) from major where mname=#{mname} and did=#{did} and is_del=0
select count(*) from grade where gname=#{gname} and mid=#{mid} and is_del=0
select count(*) from classinfo where classname=#{classname} and gid=#{gid} and is_del=0
